adventureWorks2016_EXT.description: Installs Adventure Works 2016 with in-memory tables.

adventureWorksDW2016_EXT.description: Installs Adventure Works Data Warehouse 2016 with very big tables.

wideWorldImportersDW.description: Installs Wide World Importers Data Warehouse V1.0.

wideWorldInMemory.displayName: Wide World Importers with Memory tables
wideWorldInMemory.description: Installs Wide World Importers with Memory tables.

instanceName.description: Put the instance name in the format: "server\instance", ".\instance" or "instance". If you leave empty, will use the default instance, or (localdb) if there's no default instance.

backupPath.description: Specify the download destination for the sample database backups

samplePath.description: The path to install the final sample databases

downloadOnly.description: Will only download databases without setting them up. Useful when you want to create an image that will then be Syspreped.

setupOnly.description: Will only setup the databases that have previously been downloaded. Useful after a VM deployment where the databases files are part of the base image.

uninstall.description: Drops all sample databases and removes the samples folder.
